item.description:
Cash game, first-come, first seated, we can accommodate waiting players until a seat opens.

Buyin min: $60 Buyin max: $300 (or biggest stack @ table)

 

Game has dedicated dealer, stocked mini-fridge with water & soda plus an extra mini-fridge if you'd like to BYOB. Pizza and snacks provided by host.

Last weeks game ran until around midnight.

We have a Bad Beat Jackpot (currently at $205 and qualifier is losing with Tens full or better) .  When the BBJ is hit, we pay 50% to the loser of the hand, 25% to the winner and the remaining 25% is split between everyone who played that night.

 

We also have a $25 Button Bonus (when the game starts whomever gets the button will receive bonus starting cash to play!)

If players are headsup you can run it twice (if both agree).

No smoking inside, but you're welcome to smoke outside, plenty of off-street parking available.

Please park near the silver Camry and come in via the door on the side deck. House is on the corner of a four-way intersection, our driveway is near the fire hydrant. HUGE yard with a small shed and then a larger 3-bay garage/barn further back on the property.

 

note: I have friends outside of Meetup that will be attending as well, so the RSVP list here won't represent the full number of players :)

 

My phone is 860-597-3776 if you have any trouble finding us!

 

Anthony

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: 1/2 NL Poker Every Sat at 7pm - East Windsor
